question_stem.en: A 78-year-old man dies of advanced esophageal cancer. The man's family donates his body for teaching purposes and an autopsy is performed. Gross examination of the heart reveals left ventricular chamber size and wall thickness within normal limits. No significant atherosclerosis is seen in the coronary arteries. On microscopic examination, myocardial cells demonstrate prominent yellow-brown intracytoplasmic granules as shown in the exhibit {{exhibit_1}}.
question_stem.zh: 一名78岁男性死于晚期食管癌。该男子的家人捐献了他的遗体用于教学，并进行了尸检。心脏的肉眼检查显示左心室腔的大小和壁厚在正常范围内。冠状动脉未见明显动脉粥样硬化。镜下检查显示，心肌细胞显示突出的黄褐色细胞质内颗粒，如{{exhibit_1}}所示。

question.en: Which of the following most likely accounts for the observed microscopic changes?
question.zh: 以下哪项最有可能解释观察到的微观变化？

explanation.en:
Explanation

The yellow-brown pigment contained within intracytoplasmic granules (ie, residual bodies) in this man's myocardium represents lipofuscin. Lipofuscin is composed of lysosomal breakdown products including lipid polymers and protein-complex phospholipids that result from free radical injury and lipid peroxidation. The insoluble granules are considered a wear-and-tear product that accumulates with age, and they are commonly seen in low-turnover cells (eg, heart, liver, central nervous system) of the elderly.

Malnourishment, as may have been present in this man with advanced esophageal cancer, may contribute to increased lipofuscin production.

(Choice A) A common example of exogenous pigment endocytosis occurs when urban-residing individuals inhale carbon or coal dust that is taken up by macrophages within the lung parenchyma, resulting in prominent black pigment (ie, anthracosis).

(Choice B) Glycogen is a glucose polymerization product and typically appears as clear vacuoles within the cytoplasm. These clear vacuoles are seen in abundance in patients with glycogen storage disease.

(Choice C) Iron-containing brown pigment called hemosiderin is often seen in areas of localized iron overload caused by bleeding into tissues. Decompensated heart failure causes leakage of edema and erythrocytes into the lung parenchyma, and hemosiderin-laden macrophages can be seen {{exhibit_2}}.

(Choice E) Hyaline is a form of protein accumulation that can be intracellular or extracellular. It typically appears as a glassy, homogenous pink deposit, as seen with hyaline arteriosclerosis of the kidney {{exhibit_3}}.

(Choice F) Melanin is an oxidation product of tyrosine metabolism and typically appears as pigmented granules dark brown to black in color. Melanoma demonstrates high melanin content {{exhibit_4}}.

Educational objective:

Lipofuscin is a yellow-brown pigment composed of lysosomal breakdown products of lipid polymers and protein-complex phospholipids. It is considered a wear-and-tear product and marker of aging because it accumulates over time, and residual bodies containing lipofuscin are prevalent in low-turnover cells (eg, heart, liver, central nervous system) of the elderly {{exhibit_5}}. {{exhibit_6}} {{exhibit_7}}
explanation.zh:
解释

此男子心肌细胞质内颗粒（即残余体）中含有的黄褐色色素代表脂褐素。脂褐素由溶酶体分解产物组成，包括脂质聚合物和蛋白质复合磷脂，这些产物源于自由基损伤和脂质过氧化。这些不溶性颗粒被认为是随年龄增长而累积的磨损产物，通常见于老年人的低周转细胞（例如，心脏、肝脏、中枢神经系统）。

营养不良，如患有晚期食管癌的该男子可能存在的情况，可能导致脂褐素产生增加。

（选项A）外源性色素胞吞作用的常见例子发生在城市居民吸入碳或煤尘时，这些物质被肺实质内的巨噬细胞吸收，导致出现突出的黑色素（即，炭末沉着症）。

（选项B）糖原是葡萄糖聚合产物，通常表现为细胞质内的透明空泡。这些透明空泡在糖原贮积症患者中大量出现。

（选项C）含铁的棕色色素称为血铁黄素，通常见于由组织内出血引起的局部铁过载区域。失代偿性心力衰竭导致水肿和红细胞渗漏到肺实质中，并且可以看到含血铁黄素的巨噬细胞 {{exhibit_2}}。

（选项E）透明变性是一种蛋白质积聚形式，可以是细胞内或细胞外的。它通常表现为玻璃状、均匀的粉红色沉积物，如肾脏的透明变性动脉硬化 {{exhibit_3}}。

（选项F）黑色素是酪氨酸代谢的氧化产物，通常表现为深棕色至黑色色素颗粒。黑色素瘤显示出高黑色素含量 {{exhibit_4}}。

教育目标：

脂褐素是一种黄褐色色素，由脂质聚合物和蛋白质复合磷脂的溶酶体分解产物组成。它被认为是磨损产物和衰老的标志，因为它会随着时间的推移而积累，并且含有脂褐素的残余体在老年人的低周转细胞（例如，心脏、肝脏、中枢神经系统）中普遍存在 {{exhibit_5}}。{{exhibit_6}} {{exhibit_7}}

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of intracellular accumulations, specifically lipofuscin, and its association with aging and cellular damage. It requires understanding the composition and significance of lipofuscin in the context of a patient with advanced esophageal cancer.

The best approach is to recognize the description of lipofuscin as a yellow-brown, "wear-and-tear" pigment associated with aging and cellular damage. Eliminate options that describe other types of intracellular accumulations or pigments with different characteristics and etiologies.
summary.zh:
这个问题测试对细胞内积聚的知识，特别是脂褐素，及其与衰老和细胞损伤的关系。它要求了解脂褐素的组成和重要性，以及在晚期食管癌患者的背景下。 

最好的方法是识别脂褐素的描述，即与衰老和细胞损伤相关的黄褐色“磨损”色素。排除描述具有不同特征和病因的其他类型的细胞内积聚或色素的选项。
